name: VELUCITY
description:
VELUCITY, a rhythm game with a new feel, is released in Steam through Early Access!

Enjoy the game with a keyboard that anyone can easily start with.

Various sound genres

Rhythm game enthusiasts like the Hardcore and Trance genres.

You can even enjoy variety genre music with VELUCITY.

EZ2AC sound source also VELUCITY

You can also see EZ2AC's songs,

the representative of the Korean arcade rhythm game, at VELUCITY.

Enjoy it in a different pattern from the arcade.

Songs of various artists

Cosmograph, nato, Lhou, P4koo and Demitigo

playing a song by a different artist.

Explore the CITY

New songs will be updated.

Please enjoy the expanded VELUCITY.
